Key Arguments: The proposed legislation poses a serious threat to religious freedoms and freedom of speech.
Every person should have the right to freedom of speech without threats, especially during troubled times.
Notable Quotes: It appears to be a Very Serious Threat to Religious Freedoms and Freedom of Speech, that every person should be able to have, without threat to them, especially in these troubled times in Earth's history.
We pray to God that there will be some 'Martin Luthers' in the Parliament to help Influence minds to Lay Aside this Proposed Bill, for the time being at least.
